lines.text: I know for some women, men are a household necessity; myself, I'd rather have a canary.
Cream and two sugars? My, you're a reckless woman! No wonder you look so happy.
You know, every time I eat a hamburger I think of my horse.
Oh, you didn't know? I'm gonna have nine children.

[Flirting]
Oh, you make these other women look like it's a hard times party.
lines.character: Red, Alison's Dance Partner at Party

lines.text:
[throwing a pillow onto a "lounging area"]
Are you naturally enthusiastic?

[wide-eyed]
Oh I'm really quite human, you'd be amazed...
